posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
I am trying to use the CBC to create the output for the Nightshade build.

I am at level 21, trying to go to level 22 (which would be Shadowdancer) - I have all the prereqs (Feats: dodge, mobility Skills: hide 10 ranks, move silently 8 ranks, tumble 5 ranks) but the CBC will only let me take M (Monk), F (Fighter)  or 0 (I have no idea what that is) from the dropdown under Classes.

Anyone know why?

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content: I can see from the screen shot that you have chosen monk and fighter as classes, but I am not able to see what 3rd class you have chosen. Are you sure that you have chosen SD as a third class after monk and ... wait... shouldn't one of the the classes be assassin?

posts.author: TheSquid
posts.content: I believe you should preselect what classes your character will have under column Classes (BK?). As you see, the preset in the sheet is Monk/Fighter/nothing, which is likely the reason you can only select Monk, Fighter or 0.

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
But I have no Fighter levels!

Take a look!  They are all Monk.

I cannot take a level in Shadowdancer, regardless.  I am wondering why.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: On the top, to the right of Feats, you have selected Monk and Fighter and, apparently, no third class, although we cannot see it in the screenshot.  You can only select on the far left the classes you have chosen to the right of Feats.
